评论概述: Great top for working out in!
评论详情: Great top! Loved the fabric and how tight it was when I worked out!

评论用户: Too flimsy and lightweight for the front door….looks cute but wind blows it away. I will try to repurpose it for a Christmas display inside
评论详情: I just got this today, so can’t speak on durability. I got the red which is bright cherry like the picture. I wear athleta elation leggings exclusively and this fabric is soft and feels really similar for half the price. True to size, I’m a medium in athleta tops and the medium here fits perfect. You cannot see the pads in the built in bra. I will definitely be buying more from this brand.

Even for a small busted woman like myself, this one fits well. The padding is a nice touch but not too much. I don't wear it as often now because I live in a place where exposing your middle is somewhat frowned upon (if you have high waist leggings it will cover you fully, but if you raise your arms above your head you'll probably show some skin). Will wear it more often again at home in the summer and when I move back to a less conservative area.

These are my go-to tanks. I bought 3 colors for pickleball and everyday wear and I could not recommend more. I play hard and these tops have lasted months without stretching. Very supportive but don’t cut in and create those weird armpit fat rolls. The length is perfect to pair with most tennis skirts. Highly recommend for working out and sports.
Fits great, fabric is great and the price is great.
I’m glad I sized up because even sizing up it’s a bit small. Washes great and I love the length.

This top is AWESOME, but do not order the pink if you are looking for a true pink. I am very sad and will be returning, the top is wonderful quality but if you are looking for pink do not get this top, it's more of a hot orange. Was ordering it to wear with a pair of pink shoes and when adding the pink shoes to the outfit it looked like a clown outfit because the pink was SOOOOOOOOOOO off
I have a medium from another brand that fits perfectly. This one was very tight. I should have bought a large. Otherwise, very pretty.
The length is shorter than the photos make it seem. It’s more like a cami bra than a tank.
Love this top for my workouts! I'm 5'8 135lbs - ordered a small and it fit great!

I love these types of tops for working out or even wearing casually in the summer. The back straps are so cute and the color is just like the photo. It reaches a perfect length with high waisted shorts that it doesn’t show any stomach unless you raise your arms. The built in bra makes it very comfortable. It isn’t see through and has a bit compression. I don’t have much of a bust and am 5’4” ish. I got my regular size of size small and it fit perfectly. I would buy more of these in more colors. I have many other types of shirts like this and this one is probably my favorite.

In the photo I’m wearing one of my many colors of this tank. THIS BRAND OF TANK TOPS ARE MY FAVORITE!! I CANNOT RECOMMEND THESE ENOUGH! on a less dramatic note, yes I love these. I have repurchased them and currently have one in almost every color! The support these tanks give me is so good and the tightness is so perfect!
I love these workout tops, especially the strappy back. I got the grey and the pink. It has enough support for me to workout. It is slightly cropped but that is how I like my workout tops.
I love these tanks for every day wear! they are true to size, they’re the perfect length to cover the stomach. the material is super comfortable and the built in bra is just the right size.
Bought two for traveling and hiking, and they are the perfect versatile item. They’re super comfortable, durable, the fabric is soft, and they work great for anything from running to a dinner out.
Horrible fit, very uncomfortable.

I bought a medium and it fits, but might be a bit snug. The bra insert doesn't sit right underneath my chest the way I like it too, but that's probably because I need a larger size.  I think I'm going to order a large and see if it fits better.  Other than that,  it fits perfect everywhere else and isn't tight anywhere else.  Holds me in while I'm working out and is comfortable.  I wear a 36DD and sometimes the medium sport bra's fit, but sometimes they don't.

I absolutely love these tops. I ordered it in 6 different colors. Rather it’s the warmer months, and you need a supportive hiking top, or the cooler months and need a supportive top to layer. They are advertised as sports bras, in which they have the support and comfort, but I use it as a top. Plus the removable pads are great for the more modest girlies. I’ve been looking a long time for something long enough to be a crop top, but also covers most of the midriff with any high-wasted pants. For reference, I am 5’8” and 125lbs. I typically wear small tops, Small to Medium sports bra, a 32 DD in V.S, and got a size medium.

评论概述: Cute, but poorly made/didn’t hold up
评论详情: Really cute style, loved the back of this tank, however it did not hold up. I have only worn it once - for less than 2 hours of playing pickleball, and the bottom hem started coming undone with long threads and the stitching coming out. It hasn’t even been washed yet.

评论用户: It Truly works so fast and so well! I am obsessed and did not have any sensitivity! I will definitely be buying more
评论详情: I would size down one size if you need more support but other than that this tank top is super cute and perfect for any workout or summer top!

评论概述: Looks so good, feels so good!
评论详情: Amazing top, hugs curvy girls just the right way. Cute colors & affordable. I loved it. I use it for the gym and heavy days.
Good quality material
Have this in many colours. Fits perfectly.
Color is not a true red.  It is more orange than red.  And fabric was weird, kind of cheap.

评论概述: the size guide recommended based on my measurements was incorrect
评论详情: Fabric is nice and longer design was something that interested me

Love this top. In white you can totally see the pads, though. Looks like Balogna Barb from Pitch Perfect lol so I just took those out because nipping looked better than that. I’m normally a large but I’m busty so I feel like I’m spilling out a bit, so I might try the XL to see if it fits better while still holding everything in place. The bottom rides up on me so I find myself pulling it down a lot, but that could be because I have a smaller waist and big hips so it’s kind of “story of my life.”
Better than expected
this top is super cute and comfy for the price! I will be getting other colors!

评论概述: Fit is true to size, nice color
评论详情: Fit is true to size, the blue is a nice vibrant color. It fit well but I think it was a little too cropped for me personally.

Great workout top, bought it in a few different colors. It’s a good thickness and is secure to wear for exercise. Love the bright red color. Only complaint is movement of the built in padding, it shifts around when washed.
I could wear this tank every day. It’s so comfy. Great support and cute back.
Excelente material Fresh Runs a litle bit smaller.
Love this top. May need extra support for bigger chested ladies if doing more exercise but I’m very happy with it.
Love, love, love!! Waiting for a sale to order more. I wear this too at least 1-2x a week.
I bought two of these and I’m so impressed with the quality! It’s thick and holds up well in the wash. Definitely going to buy more colors!!
Bought for the gym and it’s super cute and comfy! Would buy again for sure!
Nice style but too small. I’m 30C,  and I bought xs based on the chart. But this tank is very tight on me
these tanks are literally the best things ever! i have these in 3 different colors and still want more!!! they are SO worth the price and literally live in these. in the summer!!😊
My nieces favorite Lululemon dupe! The quality is amazing
This is a great dupe! I’m 5’9 139 and got a small and it’s perfect. Supportive and lifting in the chest. This is the exact fabric as the well known brand.

I'm 5'4 130 lb and I ordered a large. It's a little bit loose but I don't like my clothing super tight. A medium probably would have fit. Also. This looks super cute. Because it's a little loose. It's not going to provide a whole lot of support, but for pickleball it's perfect. It does have removable pads but they're comfortable and have good coverage. I ordered two more. I liked it so much.
Love the top so much I purchased multiple colors! It’s all I wear for working out now. Please please make an olive green one to match the leggings!

I really loved the material and how soft it was. With it being white I was worried about it being see through but it was not at all. The only thing I don’t love is that the boob pads are too small for the breast area, but I seem to have that issue no matter what I buy and I usually just take them out. I weigh 140, I am wearing a size medium, that is my true size and my bra size is normally a 36F.

评论概述: Removable bra cups are a must! Love this pink color!!
评论详情: No complaints other than maybe needing to swap out the bra cups for less lumpy ones of my own. But the color is great, fabric is perfect , and I really like the crisscross straps!
Even looking at the chart. Fits like a small (IE I can't even put it on) even though I ordered the largest size.
I love the fit, color and style! Great coverage and support.

This top is made with quality material, feels great and looks cute. My only complaint is that the red faded a bit after the first wash.  Update, I’ve bought two more. The Cassis color and black. I LOVE these tops.

The length is perfect to wear with high waisted biker/running shorts and not show skin. Great support, I wear it for 5 mile runs. Pads have good coverage can even be worn as a swim top. My mother-in-law tried it on and loved it too

评论概述: I’m not sure I like this
评论详情: I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, 36b cup. I am wearing a large which is my normal sport bra size in the color “carbon dust”.  Carbon dust photos look like a lighter wine tinted khaki but the item sent was darker and more on the yellowish/green tint side of khaki. I don’t like the color sent. That aside, this does have a really supportive built in bra for a b cup, not just little pads, but more support there too. However, the material is not very stretchy. It’s super firm and restrictive, I was surprised by that. When it’s on though it’s okay. Overall I like it for the built in bra and the length and thickness of material but I wish there was more stretch and softer fabric. I’m returning for color issue but I might still buy another color.

评论概述: Ordered twice and sent both back
评论详情: The small was too small and the medium was too big but also small in other places.  I returned both.
Great fit, lightweight with good coverage

I love this bra/top!! I have it in 3 colors. I’m usually a small, but sized up to a medium and I’m glad I did, in fact I could probably wear a large. This top is perfect to wear with high waisted leggings or shorts if you don’t want much (or any) of your stomach to show. Exactly the fit I want! Buy this top, just size up!
Fits true to size. Love the light purple color. Good support even for HITT classes
Supportive and great for tall ladies!

评论概述: Love this! Quality is GREAT, super comfy. NEED MORE!
评论详情: I LOVE this and I wear it ALL the time. I wear it with shorts, overalls, skorts, pants. This is one of my go to tops. It has support, pads to hide nipples, it’s buttery soft and I feel great in it! I can’t wait to buy more colors! I bought the white and it washed well. I bought a size Large in pink and black as well. It fits true to size and I’m a 34 DD.

I bought this thinking it would be cute to wear at sport practice but it broke before I could even wear it to practice! I thought this would be better quality due to the pricing. I have bought cheaper sports bras then this that have lasted years. Very disappointed.
Really holds everything in place, nothing to worry about.
I like the fit of this top. No gaps and comes to my waist, so not real short. I wear this in place of a bra. Ordered a few more.
Top is very soft and fitting. Only giving 4 stars due to its length. It falls about an inch above belly button

I really like this top. If I’m doing moderate-level exercise, I wear it on its own. If I’m doing high-intensity, I wear an extra sports bra underneath but I don’t mind this at all. It’s seriously cute and comfortable and I reach for it more than any of my other workout tops. The length is perfect for me (I prefer not to have my stomach show if my arms are down) and sits right at the top of my high-waisted shorts. I’ve gotten several compliments about the cute cross-cross feature in the back. Definitely recommend!
Loved it so much. I ordered L since I’m 38B and don’t like it too tight. it fits perfectly and so confortable. Good quality and looked great.
Almost impossible to stretch enough to get over my head and pulled down, very tight. My breasts are smashed flat.
I absolutely love the length of these. Comfortable, supportive, great true to size fit. I have already bought 2 and wear them ALL THE TIME. Will probably buy more honestly.

评论概述: Shirt is more cropped than in the photo
评论详情: Great quality. Color as pictured. Much more cropped than expect.

I absolutely love!  I always get compliments when I wear. I purchased the dazzling blue then ordered another in white.  I wear them to work out and also dress with cute capris for lunch out.  I’ve removed the bra pads as well, and fabric is thick, and covers perfect.  Fits really well, very flattering.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: This workout top is exactly what I was looking for! Other workout tops would ride up too high to where they would sit wear a sports bra would which is not the coverage I want when I’m wearing workout tops outside of the gym to run errands or go to class. This top is still cropped, but it falls right at the midpoint of my torso at my belly button so paired with my other workout attire it is perfect! It is also incredibly supportive for the girls!
Bulky fabric, bra pads are too thick, and the fit is awkward.  I like the color and the material, but wish it were longer and less complicated in terms  of the built in bra.  Weird.

Bought this top because I loved the color and looked so cute in the photo. However it is MUCH shorter (like a crop top) and tighter than expected!! If you size up it could help tightness, bit probably not length. Pretty revealing and skimpy shirt

Good fabric (brushed - it will show sweat), perfect length, good support (for smaller chests). I'm 5'2", 120 pounds, 32C. I purchased 4 different colors in size small, all fit the same (true to size). They have a shelf bra in addition to the removable padding. My favorite thing is that they're a bit longer than my other long line sports bras, so they're more like a cropped tank top. Hits just under my belly button

评论概述: Close to a high end sports bra
评论详情: The fabric is super soft. The fit is perfect. This is as nice as an Alo or Viori. Bought in more colors.

I bought this white tank for the gym and I absolutely love it. The criss-cross back is adorable and the neckline is flattering. I love to pair these tanks with shorts to wear at the gym. I’ve gotten lots of complements on them.
I ended up buying 3 of these and I love the fit and they are perfect!  Size is right and they are not too short or too long!  Love them!
I like the way this fits and it’s material
Great quality thick fabric and it fits great. I bought two colors but will be buying more. It has the perfect level of support for Pilates/every day wear. The fabric is on par with Lulu, etc.
My daughter actually wears these more than her lulu. Very cute, reasonable priced and good quality.
LOVE! absolutely love - the best material and has a built in bra. the perfect length
I wear this to the race track in the summer when you do not want to wear a real bra! Its so comfortable and not super thick!

Fits true to size, this top is so comfortable. It doesn’t leave strap lines and dig into my shoulders causing discomfort after a few hours, I actually started sleeping in it because it’s perfect for all this hot weather and it is so comfortable! Will be ordering more for sure 🤩
Stains somewhat easily, but the fabric is breathable and still spandex-like!
Love the color of this shift the red is RED! Fits true to size and doesn't ride up through the day or during a workout. Good for long torso ladies.
I ordered a white one and green, white was a little see through and the green was perfect. Also, if you want a looser fit maybe size up. I ordered a size small and it fits pretty tight but i like it
I absolutely love the feel of this tank top! Gives me lululemon vibes! Such a great dupe for an affordable price. Love the soft and buttery feeling it has. Definitely will be purchasing more!

评论概述: runs small, not true to color
评论详情: The picture shows the model as a 34B wearing a size small. Since I am also a 34B, I ordered a size small, but I could barely squeeze into it. I ordered the top in Peach Pink, but in person, the color is neon, not the muted shade shown in the picture.

It’s a bit snug to get on but it holds everything in. Long enough to hit the top of my high waisted leggings and shorts but still has a cute cropped look. I got an XS and it fit well. I’m a 30d/dd depending on brand.

While the cutest of this product is great, i think my favorite part is that the padding stays in place and I am not constantly finding it in my dryer outside of the tank top, I never even need to adjust it inside of the tank either!  Also as a person who sweats easily, it almost never shows sweat stains. I can do a 1 hour stair master session and my shirt stays pretty dry!

Pretty true to size (5’7, 140lbs, 32c) but my top came with only 1 pad and the color was more off white than the picture showed. I’m returning and hopefully getting a new one that looks better and has both pads!
I love these, anything Heynuts never disappoints! True to size, well made

评论概述: Cute nice looking top, but extremely small.
评论详情: I wear small or x-small, but this is too small to get on.  Go way up on your size!
Super cute but the straps & bust area was really tight,  (I got a size L, & I’m a 36C with a broader back) which was uncomfortable. Didn’t love it enough to exchange so I just returned.
The only sports bras I wear!!!

This top feels like a lululemon dupe. I have a large chest and I feel super secure when wearing it. It is not a full length top stops around your belly button depending on how long of a torso you have. I’ve received so many compliments on this color. I already have more colors on the way. Perfect to wear running errands, casual, or working out. The material is so soft you’ll want to wear it everyday. Great price for the quality.
Running small, size up. But it looks great on

评论概述: Doesn’t really work with narrow rib cage and full cup
评论详情: Really wanted this to work and tried two sizes. I have a narrow ribcage and a c cup. With the medium the cup area was too small/short so I was spilling out the sides/top.  With the large the cup area fit but the bottom band was too loose so it just kept riding up to where it was across my chest with half in half out which was not flattering.
It's perfect for working out, it keeps everything in place💯

评论概述: Beer tank tops for busty women
评论详情: They fit perfectly!!  The straps don’t dig into you.  It’s  very sexy while holding you in place and slimming you down.  I plan to get more colors
Love love love these

I absolutely love these crop tops!! It’s been really challenging for me to find a crop top that’s flattering on me. I’ve always felt like it looked like I was wearing a shirt meant for a toddler. I think it’s because I have a longer torso and wider frame. For those reasons, I purchased a large even though I’m normally a size small/medium. I love the crisscross straps in the back and the colors. I ended up order even more colors since I love the style so much. They’re really comfortable to workout in as well.
Super cute and great support for a nursing mom! Also very soft.
The material feels buttery soft was super excited however after one wear the strap completely came apart. Super disappointing
I got these for my daughter. She loves them. They are very supportive and soft. Great price too!
